head.title: Paris Cooperative High School - Paris Cooperative High School

meta.content: Starting March 31st, Illinois State Board of Education (ISBE) replaced Act of God days with remote learning days. Teachers will continue providing students lessons through Google Classroom or through...

strong.font:
Starting March 31st, Illinois State Board of Education (ISBE) replaced Act of God days with remote learning days. Teachers will continue providing students lessons through Google Classroom or through paper packets. The only change we see at this time is grading. Teachers will start grading assignments since grading will be done on a pass/incomplete basis. Assignments can be turned in directly to teachers or dropped off at the front foyer area at school from 8:00-3:00. There will be no assignments given during Spring Break, April 6 - 10. WiFi hotspots are located in yellow buses at Mayo, Memorial, Wenz, Crestwood, Kroger, MSB Bus Garage, Oliver, Vermillion, Creative Center, and Henson Garage, Please practice social distancing around buses. More chromebooks will be distributed on Friday at Memorial at 9:00 A.M.
​

a.span: Letter to Families about the Coronavirus
